title: How to Make a Coffee Coolatta from Dunkin Donuts

steps.headline: Make strong coffee by brewing twice the amount of coffee grounds that the coffee maker recommends.
steps.description: You can also make strong coffee by doubling the amount of instant coffee with boiling water. Place it in the refrigerator and let it chill until the coffee is cold.

steps.headline: Take the cold coffee out and pour it into a blender.
steps.description: Combine the rest of the ingredients into the blender. Blend everything except for ice cubes together for one minute, on a low speed, to dissolve the sugar.

steps.headline: Put the ice cubes, at a slow pace to avoid splashing, and blend on a high speed until the ice is crushed.
steps.description: Turn off the blender when you don't hear any more ice being crushed or blended.

text: Make strong coffee by brewing twice the amount of coffee grounds that the coffee maker recommends. You can also make strong coffee by doubling the amount of instant coffee with boiling water. Place it in the refrigerator and let it chill until the coffee is cold. Take the cold coffee out and pour it into a blender. Combine the rest of the ingredients into the blender. Blend everything except for ice cubes together for one minute, on a low speed, to dissolve the sugar. Put the ice cubes, at a slow pace to avoid splashing, and blend on a high speed until the ice is crushed. Turn off the blender when you don't hear any more ice being crushed or blended. Finished.
